title: 【1.11.2】如何自定义盔甲的盔甲值和盔甲韧性
author: 黑茶RGO
txt_content: 如何在1.11.2用命令方块自定义四件盔甲的盔甲值和盔甲韧性，要求不能出现多余项，例如头盔只显示戴在头上的属性，而不是所有部分都显示

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
楼上代码有误，我只是想标记下数值颜色，没想到会把颜色代码写进去，重新发下:/give @p minecraft:diamond_helmet 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1194138286,UUIDMost:1194138286,Amount:5,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:head},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:299138283,UUIDMost:299138283,Amount:7,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:head}]}复制代码第一个Amount:5 表示盔甲值5，第二个Amount:7 表示盔甲韧性7，数值可自由修改，改变头盔类型请替换diamond
/give @p minecraft:diamond_chestplate 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:927626289,UUIDMost:927626289,Amount:5,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:chest},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1616375284,UUIDMost:1616375284,Amount:7,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:chest}]}复制代码
胸甲
/give @p minecraft:diamond_leggings 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1039233113,UUIDMost:1039233113,Amount:5,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:legs},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:392776083,UUIDMost:392776083,Amount:7,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:legs}]}复制代码
护腿
/give @p minecraft:diamond_boots 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:-118375210,UUIDMost:-118375210,Amount:5,AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:Armor,Slot:feet},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1830065440,UUIDMost:1830065440,Amount:7,AttributeName:generic.armorToughness,Name:ArmorToughness,Slot:feet}]}复制代码
鞋子
